trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the API is unable to connect to the server.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class.
The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> class.
The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
This message takes into account the current system culture.
The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
An error message.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> instances.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref>

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref>
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
The text of the message.
A nested exception.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified error code.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException.ErrorCode%2A> property set to the value of `errorCode`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The text of the message.
An error code.

Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class with the specified error message, the specified nested exception, and the specified error code.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, and the private `errorCode` property is set to `errorCode`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
The text of the error message.
A nested exception.
An error code.

Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class with the specified error message, the specified nested exception, the specified error code, and the specified server name.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, the private `errorCode` property is set to `errorCode`, and the private `serverName` property is set to `serverName`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
The text of the message.
A nested exception.
An error code.
A server name.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the parameter name and additional exception information.

<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException.GetObjectData%2A> sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
During deserialization, the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
For more information, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that will hold the serialized object data.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object that will hold contextual information about the source or destination.
